name: Elysium
storyline:
Welcome to Elysium!
First and foremost, it is not much of a greeting because you end up on an island, ultimately having nothing on you. However, you are here to discover a valuable artifact, an ancient civilization that lived thousands of years from today's world with much more advanced technology.

An Intriguing Story About…
This is not a story thrown back of gameplay that you have seen in survival games. There is interest and stimulus to explore mixed with the themes of tragedy and sorrow.

Trent Brisbane, Roberto Galavelas, Johnny MacKinney, and Lydia Edgars. The ultimate team consists of four treasure hunters sent to find an island that has been the subject of rumors for a long time. However, this is not an ordinary island but hosted by an ancient lost civilization…

We heard this mysterious civilization had much more advanced technology, science, and societal style than others in roughly 500-600 BC. As we are in the 21st century, your goal is to discover whether the rumors are true. Explore the set of islands, witness what is left behind, discover the mystery, and turn stories into reality.
summary: Embark on an adventure that brings you to a mysterious island where lies the ruins of an ancient civilization. Build, fight, survive and discover how a newly discovered element on the island that gave Elythians a technological advantage also destroyed them.
